backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining admin access control, storage mixins, and numerous domain maps and counters for users, products, orders, artifacts, and logs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a Shop page announcement update to related files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping various frontend source files to short descriptions of their functionality and purpose.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation explaining frontend-visible auth, role model, first-admin bootstrap, and React Query–based data persistence patterns.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guidelines detailing the dark fantasy theme, color palette, typography, spacing, UI components, and interaction styles.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation outlining local storage categories, canister-backed data, offline queue behavior, and React Query invalidation strategy.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Feature specification listing Phase 1 and future features for each site page, covering structure and planned functionality.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Defines the site's full page map, navigation, access levels, and phase‑1 architecture scope for the dark‑fantasy web app.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases covering authentication, role-based access, product browsing, and core flows across devices and browsers.
Outlines the iteration workflow, offline-first feedback system, admin review flow, and technical hooks for queued mutations and drafts.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Describes deployment steps for IC backend and frontend hosting, including environment variables, canister upgrades, and hosting options.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes used across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the SPA root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React app router, lazy-loaded pages, query client, and route tree for all main site sections.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team section with flip cards showing member info on front and detailed bios on back.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical timeline of company milestones using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Provides a form to view the masked admin access code and update it with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Wraps and displays the analytics snapshot section for the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCoupo: Manages coupons with create, toggle validity, send to customer, and refresh functionality using multiple mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Shows user feedback with search and category filtering, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Allows admins to send messages to customers and view inbox items with validation and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays all orders with filtering and opens a tracking detail modal for selected orders.
Modal for viewing and updating order tracking, including status changes, location updates, and pop-up notes using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPermi: Wraps admin content and checks caller permissions, showing loading or access-denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Shows product list with search filtering, stock/status badges, and an option to add products, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReque: Modal for reviewing and acting on a customer request, including approve, decline, messaging, coupon sending, and order conversion.
Displays and filters custom requests, loads request details, and opens a modal for admin actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSyste: Renders the system settings admin page, fetching health, logs, events, and providing refresh controls and related admin sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Displays, filters, and approves user testimonies with search and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Lists and filters admin users, showing owner/permission badges and handling load/error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/BackupReco: Handles viewing backup metadata and creating or restoring system backups with confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessageAtt: Manages file attachment uploads with progress tracking, validation, and removal for admin messages.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/A: Layout wrapper providing sidebar, top bar, and main content area for the admin dashboard.
Sidebar navigation component listing admin dashboard sections with active state handling and logout logic.
Top bar showing quick-create actions, notifications count, and profile button, using admin notification data.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/v: Dashboard home displaying quick actions, product and testimony stats, and recent data with loading and error states.
Portfolio uploader allowing image/video selection, validation, metadata entry, and mock upload workflow.
Security settings UI for viewing masked access code, updating the admin access code, and reviewing access logs.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: Admin password reset tool validating principal IDs and submitting new passwords via mutation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: Displays and manages admin accounts, including promotion, demotion, and permission toggles, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Provides controls for toggling shop availability, overriding product prices, and changing product visibility with related mutations.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Fetches and displays analytics metrics such as orders and revenue with refresh functionality and loading states.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Allows enabling or disabling the global coupon system and shows status messages and explanations.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with session clearing and login-state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup modal allowing users to submit name and email before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that checks authentication and admin role, showing appropriate access, loading, or denial states.
Checks if admin access is unlocked and redirects to /admin-access if not.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, showing loading or login UI if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Verifies the user is authenticated and is the system owner; otherwise shows loading, login, or access‑denied states.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders an accordion FAQ section with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Displays detailed tracking info for an order, including status, notes, and location updates.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Applies a fade‑in animation when the section enters the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component that toggles between front and back views with motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Implements a scroll‑based parallax effect using requestAnimationFrame and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Shows a list of recent announcements with badges, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel showcasing featured items with navigation and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of quick‑access navigation cards linking to major site sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with background layers, header, footer, random quotes, routed content, and analytics provider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, legal info, and a dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Implements the responsive header navigation with authentication checks, admin lockout logic, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a simple page wrapper that renders an optional title and description around page content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty file placeholder for a portfolio details modal component.
Empty file placeholder for a portfolio widget section component.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays up to three random quotes using a custom hook and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Manages image/video uploads with validation, previews, progress tracking, and removal for request submissions.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders an accordion listing predefined services with icons, summaries, and detailed feature descriptions.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Shows a modal with product details, images, availability, pricing, and cart‑addition functionality.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Displays a front/back flip card for a product with image, pricing, availability, and a details button.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Implements a sliding cart drawer with product listing, quantity updates, coupon validation, and checkout handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Provides search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for a product list using React state and memoization.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks page views on initial load and route changes using an analytics helper.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Error boundary that logs errors locally and shows a recovery UI with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Reusable error display component that detects offline errors and offers a retry action.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: Empty placeholder file for an offline sync queue dialog.
Empty placeholder file for an offline sync status component.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Dialog that displays and clears locally stored error logs for debugging.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Form dialog for submitting a testimony with rating, text, photos, and videos.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Half: Interactive half-star rating input supporting hover previews and click-based half/full star selection.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Displays a static star rating with full and half-star rendering.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Empty file placeholder for a testimonies widget section component.
Flip card showing image/video on the front and description on the back, with hover video autoplay support.
UI for selecting, validating, previewing, and uploading testimony photos and videos with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/useH: Hook that auto-plays or pauses a video on hover based on state and feature flags.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of predefined creative quotes for random display across pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCoupons.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating, toggling, and sending admin coupons using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMessaging.ts: React Query hooks for fetching admin inbox items and sending admin messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminNotifications: Fetches admin notification counts from the backend with periodic refetching and error fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRecovery.ts: Hooks to fetch backup metadata and trigger backup creation or restoration using backend APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global handlers to log runtime errors and unhandled promise rejections.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status states using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver hook that reports when an element enters the viewport, with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed shopping cart with item add, remove, update, and quantity helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Manages per-form offline drafts with expiration, supporting load, save, get, and clear operations in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline state using window events and returns current connectivity status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with cross-browser MediaQuery API support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, permissions, admin access, and other backend-driven data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns 2–3 random quotes that update when the route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Stores and retrieves recently viewed products in localStorage with expiration and list size limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchArtifacts.ts: Provides a search hook for artifacts; currently calls an unimplemented backend search and returns an empty array.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Maintains session-scoped state persisted in localStorage with auto-expiring session IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Fetches system-level admin data such as health checks, access logs, login attempts, events, and audit logs via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, theme variables, and utility classes using Tailwind and OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccessSession.ts: Manages session-scoped admin access state using sessionStorage with helpers to check, set, and clear the flag.
frontend/src/lib/adminEntryLockout.ts: Implements persistent principal-based admin lockout using versioned localStorage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Provides analytics initialization and event tracking with support for first-party backend logging or Google Analytics.
frontend/src/lib/authorizationErrors.ts: Normalizes authorization-related errors into user-friendly messages and detects common authorization failures.
frontend/src/lib/clientDetails.ts: Extracts browser user-agent details and classifies device type for logging and security purposes.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Implements local error logging with sanitization, size limits, and utilities for reading, writing, and clearing logs.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Provides safe, versioned localStorage access with expiry handling and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Manages a versioned queue of offline mutations with enqueueing, retry tracking, failure marking, and clearing.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Selects 2–3 unique random quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page with animated sections describing the creator's background, mission, and vision using PageLayout and card components.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Implements the main admin dashboard with section switching and access gates for authorized admin users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAccess.tsx: Handles admin access code entry, authentication state, lockout logic, and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Provides an owner-only advanced admin panel with analytics, shop controls, coupon management, admin registry, and password reset sections.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a list of lore-themed blog posts in card format with category badges, dates, and read-time info.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Offers a contact form with validation, simulated submission, and additional contact/FAQ info within a two-column layout.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that loads user profile, orders, and products, handles profile setup, and displays order tracking.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: FAQ page with searchable accordion-based questions grouped by category.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, featured carousel, quick links, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/Inbox.tsx: Inbox page that lists customer messages, supports marking as read, refreshing, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio page with category filters and placeholder portfolio grid pending backend data integration.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/SearchArtifacts.tsx: Provides a searchable and filterable UI for artifacts, handling queries, categories, and rendering results with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays available services using an accordion and offers links to submit custom requests or contact the team.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Renders the shop interface with product listing, filtering, cart handling, and shop availability states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitRequest.tsx: Implements a form for authenticated users to submit custom project requests including text fields and media attachments.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Shows the Terms of Service content within a styled layout with sectioned legal information.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Displays customer testimonies with rating visuals and allows authenticated users to create new testimonies.
frontend/src/types/adminMessaging.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin messaging types.
frontend/src/types/common.ts: Defines shared frontend types for products, availability, visibility states, and external blob references.
frontend/src/types/orderTracking.ts: Defines order tracking types, status labels/order, fulfillment methods, and helper functions for next status and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/types/phase5a.ts: Provides request and testimony types with media handling and pricing preferences for Phase 5A.
frontend/src/types/phase5b.ts: Defines request detail/summary, inbox item types, attachments, actions, and statuses for Phase 5B.
frontend/src/utils/mediaValidation.ts: Implements file size, description, and video duration validation plus helpers for formatting and media type checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and utilities used across the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and requirements for adding a styled announcement to the Shop page.
